javelin.controller.action.ai

Class AiMovement

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.action.Action
      • javelin.controller.action.ai.AiMovement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ActionDescription, AiAction

    public class AiMovement
extends Action
implements AiAction
    Attempst to offer a more fluid experience than having AiMovement simple do long step-by-step movement. Tries to move at most .5AP (move action).
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
